feature.label: Slice and Merge
feature.description: A plug-in for the Rodin platform which lets the user easily cut down Event-B machines into smaller sub-models, and also lets the user merge two directly related machines (where one machine refines the other) into a new machine.
feature.copyright: Aivar Kripsaar, Tsutomu Kobayashi, and Fuyuki Ishikawa at National Institute of Informatics, Japan
